name: 单人视频工作流-生成配音

assignments.name: =voice_script
assignments.value: ={"characters_timbre": [{"timbre_name": "旁白", "timbre_des": "温暖富有故事感的成年女性声音，语速平缓，带有淡淡的诗意和引导性，能够营造温馨的童话氛围", "timbre_id": 0},{"timbre_name": "小女孩", "timbre_des": "清脆、甜美、充满活力的6岁女孩声音，音调较高但不过分尖锐，语气中带着好奇、兴奋和纯真，偶尔有可爱的童音起伏", "timbre_id": 1}], "voice_scripts": [{"text": "在一个阳光明媚的早晨，小女孩第一次踏入这个神奇的花园", "timbre_id": 0, "start_time": 500, "end_time": 3500},{"text": "哇！好漂亮的花园呀！", "timbre_id": 1, "start_time": 4500, "end_time": 6000},{"text": "她发现了一朵特别的向日葵，上面停着一只美丽的蝴蝶", "timbre_id": 0, "start_time": 6500, "end_time": 8500},{"text": "小蝴蝶，你好可爱呀", "timbre_id": 1, "start_time": 9000, "end_time": 9500}]}

parameters.jsCode:
const file_path = $('Read/Write Files from Disk2').first().json.fileName

return {
  "voice_filepath": file_path,
  "text": $('Loop Over Items1').first().json.text,
  "start_time": $('Loop Over Items1').first().json.start_time,
  "end_time": $('Loop Over Items1').first().json.end_time,
  "audio_length": $input.first().json.duration_ms
}
